questions.question:
Mia was smart, funny, and had a smile that could make _____
forgive almost anything—almost.

She rushed through breakfast, wore two different socks, and
somehow brushed her _____ with a pen instead of a comb.

The day everything went wrong at sunshine high
once upon a time at sunshine high _____, there was a girl named mia.

It all started on a monday morning when mia’s
alarm _____’t ring.

She was
known for two things: her endless curiosity and her _____ to get into trouble without
even trying.
